name: Draw and Junction
entries: Beginning at 10th level you new ways to fire your firearms:

entries.name: Danger Zone
entries: As an action on your turn, you may expend any number of bullets from a barrel firearm you are wielding, creating an explosion centered on you with a 10ft radius. All other creatures in range must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC is equal to 8 + Prof + Dex), taking {@dice 2d8} Fire damage for each bullet spent on a failure, and half as much on a success.

entries.name: Royal Guard
entries: When you or an ally within your the short range of your firearm takes damage, you can use your reaction to expend a bullet to reinforce the creatures body. The creature takes reduced damage from that source equal to a roll of your Burst Strike + your Proficiency Bonus.
